Sign-in form.rationaleTemplate: Supports credential entry, clear primary action, optional remember-me; aligns with Material Web accessibility.

Search with filters.rationaleTemplate: Helps users refine results; chips provide visible filters, text field supports query.

Inline validation (forms).rationaleTemplate: Immediate feedback reduces errors; helper text communicates constraints.

Modal confirmation.rationaleTemplate: Explicit confirm/cancel actions for destructive or irreversible tasks.

Tab navigation.rationaleTemplate: Organizes content by category; maintains context without page reload.

Empty state.rationaleTemplate: Sets expectations and suggests next steps when content is missing.

Pagination.rationaleTemplate: Enables navigation through large datasets without overwhelming the user.

Data table with sorting.rationaleTemplate: Allows users to organize and prioritize information based on different criteria.

Progressive onboarding.rationaleTemplate: Introduces features gradually, reducing cognitive load for new users.

Reset password.rationaleTemplate: Secure flow for credential recovery with clear validation and feedback.
